articles.content: Google I/O is an annual developer conference held by Google. In case you were wondering, "I/O" stands for Input/Output, as well as the slogan "Innovation in the Open". For Apple enthusiasts, that's G… [+8425 chars]

articles.title: Sony Xperia 1 IV Review: A different approach to mobile photography - XDA Developers
articles.description: The Sony Xperia 1 IV takes a different approach to mobile photography, which we break down in our review. Check out what that means here.
articles.content: Sony’s smartphones have always differed from other handsets on the market, in that they never seemed to care about industry trends. This could be something as superficial as bezel sizes — Sony has ne… [+19412 chars]
